body:
It's even weirder from "the other side". So this node's has:

Inputs: [1.02 BTC not-mine, 1.1 BTC mine]
Outputs: [0.10481803 BTC mine, 2.01 BTC not-mine]

So the transaction represents a loss of 0.99518197 BTC (-1.1 + 0.10481803).

But running `gettransaction` we see:

```
{
  "amount": -2.01000000,
  "fee": 1.01481803,
  "confirmations": 0,
  "trusted": false,
  "txid": "947ddb7d22b0c7e8edd3a56a92b8ec771aa8b18667ef508270f928b14821e924",
  "walletconflicts": [
  ],
  "time": 1535929758,
  "timereceived": 1535929758,
  "bip125-replaceable": "no",
  "details": [
    {
      "address": "2MzFcfPF56Jp6BC3FJk6yXwCY6FzhnbGt3o",
      "category": "send",
      "amount": -2.01000000,
      "vout": 1,
      "fee": 1.01481803,
      "abandoned": false
    }
  ],
  "hex": ""
}
```
